text: Shi ta [an la] chuangzaole xuduo guoyuan, qizhong you you peng jia de, you wu peng jia de, you ye zao he ge zhong ke shi de guwu, youxing tong wei butong de ganlan he shiliu. Dang tamen jieguoshi, nimen ke chi qi guo shi. Zai shouhuo de rizi, nimen dang jiaona ying jiao de tian ke, dan nimen buyao huihuo, ta [an la] jue bu xihuan huihuo zhe.
